attrProjectInward.name: project_on_inward_surfaces
attrProjectInward.comment: Enables projection on surfaces with inward facing normals

attrProjectOutward.name: project_on_outward_surfaces
attrProjectOutward.comment: Enables projection on surfaces with outward facing normals

attrBlackOutsideProjection.name: black_outside_projection
attrBlackOutsideProjection.label: black outside projection
attrBlackOutsideProjection.comment: Toggles whether projections appear outside the 0-1 uv range of the projector
